external_games.name: Journeys in Middle-earth - Haunting of Dale

name: The Lord of the Rings: Journeys in Middle-earth - Haunting of Dale
summary: Haunting of Dale is the second downloadable campaign available for purchase through the Journeys in Middle-earth companion app, offering a completely new set of quests and challenges that require both the Core Set and the new Shadowed Paths expansion to play.
